participant_1.background:
I am not close with my family, but I love my dog Bob.
i have 3 sisters and 2 brothers.
I have to find a way to get my siblings to take the cure.
i have depression and anxiety so i do not really go out a lot.
I love Mac and cheese so much that I even named my favorite book after it!

participant_2.background:
I don't like fast food, but I love a good cup of chai tea.
i am a gourmet cook.
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
i practice yoga daily.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook and practice yoga! What about you?
I love to read and spend time with my dog, Bob. I do not have a lot of friends because I have depression and anxiety.
I am sorry to hear that. I have a lot of friends, but I do not get to see them very often because I am busy with work and my kids.
I understand. I am not close with my family, but I love my dog, Bob.
That is good that you have a furry friend to keep you company.
Yes, he is my best friend. What is your favorite food?
I love blue jello and I am a gourmet cook. What is your favorite food?
I love Mac and cheese so much that I even named my favorite book after it! I am not a big fan of fast food. What do you do for work?
I am a stay at home mom. I love my job and I love my kids.
That sounds like an amazing job! I am glad that you are happy.
Thanks! You seem like a really nice person. I am glad that we met.
Thank you! I am glad to have met you too.
